entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 3:39AM AKDT by NWS

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:19PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...GUSTY WINDS AND HIGH WAVES EXPECTED TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY... A strong low will bring impactful weather to Southwest Alaska, primarily for the Greater Bristol Bay region, tonight through Friday. Gusts of 35-45 mph are likely, with gusts as high as 60 mph possible from Kamishak Bay into interior Bristol Bay. Waves up to 10-15 ft are also possible over Bristol Bay Thursday night
